summary: The module offers a streamlined interface for working with the ShapeNet 3D object collection in point‑cloud deep learning pipelines. It includes utilities to download, preprocess, and serve the data, as well as high‑level methods to train, evaluate, and run inference with a point‑transformer model built on PyTorch and DGL.
business_intent: Accelerate development and experimentation of 3D point‑cloud transformer models by providing ready‑to‑use data handling and end‑to‑end training/evaluation workflows for the ShapeNet dataset.
